name: Lev Kamenev
description:
Let's compare the revolutions!


AmericanFrenchRussian

Slogan
"Don't tread on me"
"Liberty, equality, fraternity"
"Proletariat of the world, unite"


Advantage: French. Just rolls off the tongue.


Leader, fate
Washington,president
Robespierre,beheaded
Lenin,mummy


Advantage: American. No contest here.

Jews
Does financier Haym Salomon count?
None
Trotsky, Kamenev, Zinoviev, Sverdlov...


Advantage: By default, Russian?


Casualties, estimated
Counting the British, 50,000
200,000
9,000,000


Advantage: American, but holy fuck!


Aftermath
War of 1812
Reign of Terror
Communism


Advantage: Ummmmm....
